vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ἐδᾰφ-ίζω,
beat level and firm like a floor or pavement, [Refs 4th c.BC+]:—passive, [Refs 4th c.BC+]
__II provide with a floor, οἶκον [Refs 3rd c.BC+]
__III dash to the ground, [LXX+NT]
vocabInfos.shortDef: to dash to the ground, raze level
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
to dash to the ground, raze level
primarily to form a level and firm surface; to level with the ground, dash to the ground, overthrow, raze, destroy, Lk. 19:44*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: derribar al suelo, destruir por completo
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 丟擲到地上
1a) 指城市和建築物, 被拆毀移平 (路 19:44)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) 丢掷到地上
1a) 指城市和建筑物, 被拆毁移平 (路 19:44)
